Welcome

pick your drum kit to get started

Drum pad

Super rythmic and groovy, no real cohesion, lots of love. Lots of love so much love you have no idea, I tons of sound, lots of fun, lots of play, not a problem.

Sample pad

A simple kit of short samples around 1 to 2 seconds in length taken from the song "Temple" by Sam Gellientry. 16 keys available with wildy different but similar sounds.

Loop pad

A pad made out of 2 measure loops triggered and stopped by 9 keys. A chance to check your beatmatching and compose a song on the fly.
